oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Boyd Family Photograph
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: T.M. Schleier, Knoxville,TN
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Boyd Family portrait, Knoxville, TN. Ca. 1860s. Taken by T.M. Schleier. Standing: John Mason Boyd (1833-1909, physician). Seated l-r: Eva Boyd Munson, Sophia Boyd Cornick, Jimmy Boyd, Sue Boyd Barton, Susan Howard Mason Boyd (Mrs. Samuel B. Boyd), Ella Boyd, Samuel Becket Boyd , Anna Boyd Fleming.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Group portraits; Families; Physicians;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: To use photographs or to order reproductions, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8808. Please refer to Image Number if available and provide a brief description of the photograph.
